title: Best of Gostho gopal Das | Best Bengali Folk Songs | Chander Gaye Chand Legechhe | Bangla Lokgeeti
description:
This juke box is a compilation of the evergreen songs of Baul Samrat Gostho Gopal Das. He was a renowned folk singer whose songs “Guru na Bhuji Mui” , “Chander Gaye Chand Legechhe”, had created waves in the history of Bengali folk realm. His genres included Bhatiyali, Bhawaiya, Jaari, Murshidi and many more. Get the ‘earthy’ feel of a distinctive voice that was drenched in perhaps the purest form of emotion.
